rows.label: qev041308_MSG0001
rows.name: Lonlon looking for friends to trade Miralife Cards with.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041308_MSG0002
rows.name:
Lonlon will give one lucky friend silver evello card in
exchange for silver simius card and red simius mane.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041308_MSG0003
rows.name:
Looking at Miralife simius card makes Lonlon want
to pet simius mane in real life![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041308_MSG0004
rows.name:
If friend brings silver simius card and red simius mane,
[ST:gender p1=he p2=she ] can take silver evello card from Lonlon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041308_MSG0005
rows.name:
Fluffiness of red simius mane very different than what
Lonlon think from looking at card. So satisfying![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041308_MSG0006
rows.name: Now here is silver evello card in return.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041308_MSG0007
rows.name:
Friend is looking for gold nopopotamus card? Meh!
Even Lonlon never see one in person...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041308_MSG0008
rows.name:
Friend has long journey ahead, but with luck and
patience, anything is possible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041308_MSG0009
rows.name:
Stop teasing Lonlon and hand over goods!
Lonlon dying to fluff that mane![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041308_MSG0010
rows.name:
Rumor say New LA home to one Miralife Card
collector even more dedicated than Lonlon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041308_MSG0011
rows.name:
Name was...Willy? No, Wilbur? Lonlon forgets.
Still, friend should try to seek him out.[ST:wait ]
